languages.text: "Знаешь, Идира... жизнь коротка. Почему бы тебе не поговорить с Вигдис? Она сильно беспокоится о тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Знаешь, Идира... жизнь коротка. Почему бы тебе не поговорить с Вигдис? Она сильно беспокоится о тебе".

languages.text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, Идира... жизнь коротка. Почему бы тебе не поговорить с Вигдис? Она сильно беспокоится о тебе".

traits.locale_text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."
"You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."
"You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."
"You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."

languages.text: “说真的，伊迪拉……人生很短暂。不如去找维格迪斯谈谈吧？她真的很担心你的情况。”
languages.original_text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."

traits.locale_text: “说真的，伊迪拉……人生很短暂。不如去找维格迪斯谈谈吧？她真的很担心你的情况。”

languages.text: «¿Sabe, Idira?... La vida es efímera. ¿Por qué no habla con Vigdis? Está muy preocupada por usted».
languages.original_text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe, Idira?... La vida es efímera. ¿Por qué no habla con Vigdis? Está muy preocupada por usted».

languages.text: 「イディラ…人生は短いものだ。ヴィグディスと話してみてはどうだ？彼女はお前のことを深く心配していた」
languages.original_text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ…人生は短いものだ。ヴィグディスと話してみてはどうだ？彼女はお前のことを深く心配していた」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, Idira ... Das Leben ist kurz. Warum redet Ihr nicht mit Vigdis? Sie macht sich ernstliche Sorgen um Euch."
languages.original_text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, Idira ... Das Leben ist kurz. Warum redet Ihr nicht mit Vigdis? Sie macht sich ernstliche Sorgen um Euch."

languages.text: « Vous savez, Idira... la vie est courte. Pourquoi n'iriez-vous pas parler à Vigdis ? Elle s'inquiète beaucoup pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, Idira... la vie est courte. Pourquoi n'iriez-vous pas parler à Vigdis ? Elle s'inquiète beaucoup pour vous. »

languages.text: "İdira, ne var biliyor musun? Hayat çok kısa. Neden Vigdis'le konuşmuyorsun? Senin için bayağı endişeleniyor."
languages.original_text: "You know, Idira... Life is short. Why don't you talk to Vigdis? She is deeply concerned about you."

traits.locale_text: "İdira, ne var biliyor musun? Hayat çok kısa. Neden Vigdis'le konuşmuyorsun? Senin için bayağı endişeleniyor."
